name: Watermelon Evolution - Idle Tycoon & Clicker Game
name_original: Watermelon Evolution - Idle Tycoon & Clicker Game
description:
Watermelon Evolution - Idle Tycoon & Clicker Game is a casual game developed by Evolution Games.
Watermelon Evolution - Idle Tycoon & Clicker Game is available on Android. The game is sold via Google Play.
